word:
Just as soon as you begin to humble yourselves before God, then He will come in and work with you. If the truth is worth anything to us, it is worth everything. It is through the truth that we are to be sanctified.--Ms. 7, 1886, pp. 1-6. ("Reproof for Sabbathbreaking." Remarks before the committee at Christiania [Oslo], Norway, July 11, 1886.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. July 17, 1980
